Workbench

Transform your data into analysis and visualizations.

Simple

Delivered in a modern browser, there are no more ill-defined user interfaces to learn—just learn about your data.

How Workbench works →

Fast

HTML, CSS, Javascipt, WebGL, D3.js, & ParaView Web goes in. Dynamic analysis and visualization content comes out.

Workbench guide →

Visualization

Interactive scientific- and information-visualization. 3D visualizations respond like interactive web visualizations.

Migrate your data →

Get up and running in seconds.

Quick-start Instructions

~ $ git clone https://.../workbench.git

~ $ cd workbench

~/workbench $ npm install

~/workbench $ grunt init

~/workbench $ grunt

~/workbench $ grunt serve

# => Now browse to http://localhost:8081
